blogPost.excerpt: 🧠 Smart, personalized product recommendations for Shopify stores--driven by real customer insights. 💥 Our AI algorithm is trained by millions of data points about what customers want, specifically for fashion products.
blogPost.body: 🧠 Smart, personalized product recommendations for Shopify stores--driven by real customer insights. 💥 Our AI algorithm is trained by millions of data points about what customers want, specifically for fashion products.
blogPost.title: YesPlz - Personalized fashion recommendations for Shopify
blogPost.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré

localize.description: 🧠 为Shopify商店提供智能、个性化的产品推荐--由真实的客户洞察力驱动。💥 我们的人工智能算法是通过数百万个数据点进行训练，了解客户的需求，特别是时尚产品。
localize.tagline: 为Shopify提供个性化的时尚推荐

localize.description: 🧠 爲Shopify商店提供智能、個性化的產品推薦--由真實的客戶洞察力驅動。💥 我們的人工智能算法是通過數百萬個數據點進行訓練，瞭解客戶的需求，特別是時尚產品。
localize.tagline: 爲Shopify提供個性化的時尚推薦

previous.excerpt: CopyCat is a DeepFake app for content creators. Users can create hilarious prank videos, viral social media content, celebrity lip syncs, and more with just the touch of a button!
previous.title: CopyCat A‪I‬ - Swap your face and become anybody instantly

localize.description: CopyCat是一款面向内容创作者的DeepFake应用。用户只需轻触按钮，就可以创建搞笑的恶作剧视频、病毒式社交媒体内容、名人唇语同步等。
localize.tagline: 换上你的脸，瞬间变成任何人

localize.description: CopyCat是一款面向內容創作者的DeepFake應用。用戶只需輕觸按鈕，就可以創建搞笑的惡作劇視頻、病毒式社交媒體內容、名人脣語同步等。
localize.tagline: 換上你的臉，瞬間變成任何人

next.excerpt: 🌈 Spline now adds 3D vector editing along with other great features like Post-Processing. This represents a paradigm shift for 2D design, and a step towards a 3D-first design tool.
next.title: Spline Alpha - Vector design, now in 3D

localize.description: 🌈Spline现在增加了3D矢量编辑和其他伟大的功能，如后处理。这代表了2D设计的一个范式转变，也是向3D优先设计工具迈出的一步。
🌈Spline現在增加了3D矢量編輯和其他偉大的功能，如後處理。這代表了2D設計的一個範式轉變，也是向3D優先設計工具邁出的一步。
